Reference¶

Simulating Data¶

createMultiplyImagedSN(sourcename, snType, …) Generate a multiply-imaged SN light curve set, with user-specified time delays and magnifications.

Fitting Data¶

fit_data(curves[, snType, bands, models, …]) The main, high-level fitting function.
